mainMenu.title: Magnets
mainMenu.language: Do you want to change the language to Norwegian?

levelOneInfoScreen.info: Welcome to Magneter! This is the first level, here we introduce the magnet. Try dragging the circle around the magnet to change its power and reach. The point of the game is to use the magnets to navigate the ball to the goal. Good Luck!

levelTwoInfoScreen.info: Sometimes the magnets are there to hinder you and not to help you!

levelThreeInfoScreen.info: Now you are ready for a big level, more magnets, more fun! Try following the white arrows to move the camera.

levelFourInfoScreen.info: This is an Electriomagnet! By pressing it you can turn it on or off.

levelFiveInfoScreen.info: Try combining turning the electromagnet on or off, and changing its power to navigate levels.

levelSixInfoScreen.info: Turn the Magnets off in the right pattern to scale the wall.

levelSevenInfoScreen.info: This is an motorized Electromagnet on a rail. Use it to move the ball over the chasm.

levelEightInfoScreen.info: This is a button, the ball activates it when it rolls over it. The button turns a magnet on or off.

levelNineInfoScreen.info: Dont let the ball roll over the button so the gate closes!

levelTenInfoScreen.info: Magnets with the same polarity repel each other. And dont forget, the button also turns off magnets.

levelElevenInfoScreen.info: Lots of different obstacles on this level. Good Luck!

levelTwelveInfoScreen.info: Use the Electro magnets to move from rail to rail.

levelFourteenInfoScreen.info: This is a pendulum, that means it will swing from side to side. Try using it to cross the chasm.

levelFifteenInfoScreen.info: Have you really made it all the way here? Good job! But im sorry, this is as far as you will make it! Warning: Hard!

levelFifteenEndScreen.info: Congratulation on beating Level 15! This was the last level of the game, congratulations, you beat it! Thank you very much for playing our game.
